sentences.en: He is a protean stylist who can move from blues to ballads and grand symphony.
sentences.cn: 他风格多变，从布鲁斯、乡村音乐到雄壮的交响乐都能驾驭。

sentences.en: He loved to show off his protean talent.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢炫耀他的各式各样的才能.

sentences.en: Of popular group Protean make a lot of popular design instants are become yesterday chrysanthemum.
sentences.cn: 流行界的千变万化使许多流行款式瞬间成为昨日黄花.

sentences.en: The clinical presentations protean and the diagnosis, of CAH was often difficult.
sentences.cn: CAH的临床表现多样化,诊断常很困难.

sentences.en: The eyes themselves were of that baffling protean gray which is never twice the same.
sentences.cn: 眸子是变幻莫测的灰色,时时在变化.

sentences.en: The scientists identified a protean protein that inactivates the flu virus before it can mutate.
sentences.cn: 科学家发现一种蛋白可以在流感病毒变异前使其失去活性.

sentences.en: The weather becomes protean due to the pollution's influence of long duration.
sentences.cn: 因为污染的长期持久的影响,天气变化无常.

sentences.en: TITe is his mind. It is an amphitheater in which the actor gives a protean performance.
sentences.cn: 他的头脑, 他的头脑是唯一圆形剧场,场上的演员一人扮演好几个角色.

sentences.en: Vasculitis includes a group of diseases that have different pathogenesis and protean clinical manifestations.
sentences.cn: 血管炎是一组发病机制各异,临床表现多样的疾病的总称.

words.tran_cn: 千变万化的；一人演几个角色的；变形虫的

trans.tran_cn: 多变的，易变的，变化多端的
trans.tran_en: able to keep changing or to do many things
